### At the moment we have a pretty basic icon system for combat tactics showing
### the uniticon which has the biggest bonus value in the tactic.
### This is the sprite number for each unit:
### Good 	 1=LI	 2=HI	 3=PIKE	 4=LC	 5=KNIGHTS	 6=ARCHERS	 7=HORSE ARCH.	 8=GALLEY	 9=ELEPHANT	10=CAMEL
### Neutral 11=LI	12=HI	13=PIKE	14=LC	15=KNIGHTS	16=ARCHERS	17=HORSE ARCH.	18=GALLEY	19=ELEPHANT	20=CAMEL
### Bad 	21=LI	22=HI	23=PIKE	24=LC	25=KNIGHTS	26=ARCHERS	27=HORSE ARCH.	28=GALLEY	29=ELEPHANT	30=CAMEL


##########################################################################
# Generic Tactics
##########################################################################

# Devastating Closing Charge Tactic
good_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_heavy_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Closing Charge Tactic
charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_heavy_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes

			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }

					emf_closing_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes

			}

	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance

		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes

			leader = {
				OR = {

					emf_closing_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_closing_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes

		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes

# Devastating Harass Tactic
good_harass_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 4
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = volley
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Harass Tactic
harass_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 14
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = volley
		factor = 1
	}
}

	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = volley
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Flexible Harass Tactic
flexible_harass_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 14
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = volley
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Volley Tactic
good_volley_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 6
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_ambush_volley_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_longbow_volley_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 1.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Volley Tactic
volley_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 16
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_ambush_volley_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_longbow_volley_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 1.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Volley Tactic
bad_volley_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 26
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_ambush_volley_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_longbow_volley_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.75
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Deceitful Volley Tactic
deceitful_volley_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 16
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_ambush_volley_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_longbow_volley_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 1.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Flexible Volley Tactic
flexible_volley_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 16
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_ambush_volley_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_longbow_volley_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 1.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25

	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Swarm Tactic
good_swarm_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 7
	group = swarm
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_swarm_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				emf_retreat_and_ambush_tactic_culture = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Swarm Tactic
swarm_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 17
	group = swarm
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_swarm_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				emf_retreat_and_ambush_tactic_culture = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Pike Square Tactic
good_pike_square_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 3
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_pike_square_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.75
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.75
	knights_offensive = -0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = harass
		factor = 5
	}

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 5
	}

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 3
	}
}

# Pike Square Tactic
pike_square_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_pike_square_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = -1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -1.0
	knights_offensive = -1.0
	archers_offensive = -0.75
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = -1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = harass
		factor = 5
	}

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 5
	}

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 3
	}
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_pike_square_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = -1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -1.0
	knights_offensive = -1.0
	archers_offensive = -0.75
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = -1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = harass
		factor = 5
	}

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 5
	}

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 3
	}
}

# Devastating Shieldwall Tactic
good_shieldwall_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_shieldwall_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.75
	pikemen_offensive = -0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.75
	knights_offensive = -0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.75
	pikemen_defensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.5
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.5

	enemy = {
		group = harass
		factor = 4
	}

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 3
	}
}

# Shieldwall Tactic
shieldwall_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_shieldwall_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
	pikemen_offensive = -1.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = -1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -1.0
	knights_offensive = -1.0
	archers_offensive = -0.75
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = -1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = harass
		factor = 4
	}

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 3
	}
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_shieldwall_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.75
	pikemen_offensive = -0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.75
	knights_offensive = -0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.75

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25

# Devastating Delay Tactic
good_delay_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 1
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_delay_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25
}

# Delay Tactic
delay_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_delay_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0
}

# Devastating Charge Tactic
good_melee_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_awesome_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_heavy_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shock_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_crushing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Charge Tactic
melee_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_awesome_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_heavy_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shock_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_crushing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Charge Tactic
bad_melee_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 25
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_awesome_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_heavy_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shock_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_crushing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12

		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25

# Deceitful Charge Tactic
deceitful_melee_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_awesome_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_heavy_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shock_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_crushing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}

# Devastating Raid Tactic
good_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 1
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Raid Tactic
raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Raid Tactic
bad_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 21
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Deceitful Raid Tactic
deceitful_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Flexible Raid Tactic
flexible_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Advance Tactic
good_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Advance Tactic
advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Advance Tactic
bad_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 22
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}

# Deceitful Advance Tactic
deceitful_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes

			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		leader = { trait = trickster }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

		factor = 1
	}

	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes

			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes

					emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

		factor = 1

# Devastating Stand Fast Tactic
good_stand_fast_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 3
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOR = {
			leader = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_pike_assault_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	pikemen_offensive = 1.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Stand Fast Tactic
stand_fast_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_pike_assault_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { leader = { trait = trickster } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Stand Fast Tactic
bad_stand_fast_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 23
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		NOT = {
			leader = {
				OR = {
					emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
					emf_pike_assault_tactic_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25

	horse_archers_offensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

		group = charge

	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = standfast

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25

	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

##########################################################################
# Cultural Tactics
##########################################################################

# Devastating Awesome Closing Charge Tactic
good_awesome_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.75
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Awesome Closing Charge Tactic
awesome_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Failed Awesome Closing Charge Tactic
bad_awesome_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 25
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Deceitful Awesome Closing Charge Tactic
deceitful_awesome_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Flexible Awesome Closing Charge Tactic
flexible_awesome_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_awesome_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.75
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Devastating Heavy Closing Charge Tactic
good_heavy_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_heavy_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.75
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Heavy Closing Charge Tactic
heavy_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_heavy_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 25
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes

		}

		days = 12

		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0

	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_combined_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

}

# Combined Closing Charge Tactic
combined_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_combined_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

	days = 3

	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25

	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

# Swarming Closing Charge Tactic
swarming_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Failed Swarming Closing Charge Tactic
bad_swarming_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 25
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Deceitful Swarming Closing Charge Tactic
deceitful_swarming_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Flexible Swarming Closing Charge Tactic
flexible_swarming_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_swarming_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Devastating Shock Closing Charge Tactic
good_shock_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Shock Closing Charge Tactic
shock_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Failed Shock Closing Charge Tactic
bad_shock_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 25
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Deceitful Shock Closing Charge Tactic
deceitful_shock_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Flexible Shock Closing Charge Tactic
flexible_shock_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_shock_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Devastating Crushing Closing Charge Tactic
good_crushing_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 9
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.75

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Crushing Closing Charge Tactic
crushing_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 19
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.5

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Failed Crushing Closing Charge Tactic
bad_crushing_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 29
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

deceitful_crushing_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 19
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes

	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.75

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0

	pikemen_defensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	days = 3
	sprite = 19
	group = charge
	trigger = {

		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes

			emf_crushing_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}

		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes

	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5

	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25

}

# Devastating Mameluke Closing Charge Tactic
good_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 10
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.5
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Mameluke Closing Charge Tactic
mameluke_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 20
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Failed Mameluke Closing Charge Tactic
bad_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 30
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Deceitful Mameluke Closing Charge Tactic
deceitful_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 20
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.5
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 20
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish

		flank_has_leader = yes

			emf_mameluke_closing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0

	pikemen_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Devastating Closing Roman Triple Line Tactic
good_closing_roman_triple_line_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_closing_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Closing Roman Triple Line Tactic
closing_roman_triple_line_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_closing_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25

	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes

	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_closing_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes

	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5

	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25

	group = advance
	trigger = {

		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no

		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_closing_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
