	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_closing_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Failed Closing Shield Rush Tactic
bad_closing_shield_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 22
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_closing_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Deceitful Closing Shield Rush Tactic
deceitful_closing_shield_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_closing_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

}

# Devastating Intimidating Closing Advance Tactic
good_closing_intimidating_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_closing_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Intimidating Closing Advance Tactic
closing_intimidating_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_closing_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes

	pikemen_offensive = 0.75

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25

good_closing_combined_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_closing_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Closing Combined Rush Tactic
closing_combined_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_closing_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		is_flanking = no
		days = 9 # duration of combat >= 9 days
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_closing_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_skirmish_to_melee_tactic_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	change_phase_to = melee
}

# Devastating Guerilla Harass Tactic
good_guerilla_harass_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 4
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = volley
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Guerilla Harass Tactic
guerilla_harass_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 14
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = volley
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Guerilla Harass Tactic
bad_guerilla_harass_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 24
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25

# Deceitful Guerilla Harass Tactic

	days = 3
	sprite = 14
	group = harass
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_harass_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_guerilla_harass_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25

		flank_has_leader = yes

			trait = trickster

		}

		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0

# Devastating Retreat and Ambush Tactic
good_retreat_and_ambush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 7
	group = swarm
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_swarm_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_retreat_and_ambush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Retreat and Ambush Tactic
retreat_and_ambush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 17
	group = swarm
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_swarm_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_retreat_and_ambush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 16
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_ambush_volley_tactic_culture = yes
		}

	mean_time_to_happen = {

		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 1.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Deceitful Longbow Volley Tactic
deceitful_longbow_volley_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 16
	group = volley
	trigger = {
		phase = skirmish
		emf_volley_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_longbow_volley_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 1.75
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = swarm
		factor = 1
	}
}

	days = 3

		flank_has_leader = yes

		emf_ok_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_skirmish_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes

	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25

# Devastating Awesome Charge Tactic
good_awesome_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_awesome_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.75
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Awesome Charge Tactic
awesome_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_awesome_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_heavy_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}

		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0

	pikemen_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75

	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee

		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_combined_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}

		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75

	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_combined_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Swarming Charge Tactic
good_swarming_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 1.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Swarming Charge Tactic
swarming_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 25
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_swarming_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.75

	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	}

# Devastating Shock Charge Tactic
good_shock_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 5
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_shock_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 1.5
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.5
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Shock Charge Tactic
shock_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 15
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_shock_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Crushing Charge Tactic
crushing_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 19
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_crushing_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.5

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Mameluke Charge Tactic
good_mameluke_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 10
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.5
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Mameluke Charge Tactic
mameluke_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 20
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 1.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Mameluke Charge Tactic
bad_mameluke_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 30
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.75
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.75

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Deceitful Mameluke Charge Tactic
deceitful_mameluke_charge_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 20
	group = charge
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_melee_charge_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_mameluke_charge_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.5
	knights_offensive = 1.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 1.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

	days = 3

		flank_has_leader = yes

		}

		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0

	pikemen_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 1.0

	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = advance
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Horseback Raid Tactic
good_horseback_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 1
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Horseback Raid Tactic
horseback_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

	days = 3
	sprite = 21
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes

			emf_horseback_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}

		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

# Devastating Quick Attack Tactic
good_quick_attack_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 1
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Quick Attack Tactic
quick_attack_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_quick_attack_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Attriting Raid Tactic
attriting_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Attriting Raid Tactic
bad_attriting_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 21
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25

	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

# Deceitful Attriting Raid Tactic
deceitful_attriting_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 11
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee

		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_attriting_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.5

	pikemen_defensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0

	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	}

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.75

# Devastating Mameluke Raid Tactic
good_mameluke_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 10
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.5
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.75
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Mameluke Raid Tactic
mameluke_raid_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 20
	group = defensive
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_raid_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_mameluke_raid_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.75
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.25
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.5
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = standfast
		factor = 1
	}
}

		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5

	pikemen_offensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
	knights_offensive = -0.25

	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

good_roman_triple_line_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_roman_triple_line_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25

	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}

	days = 3

	group = advance

		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }

			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }

		}

		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes

		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25

		factor = 1

# Infantry Rush Tactic
infantry_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes

	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25

	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.75
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Flexible Infantry Rush Tactic
flexible_infantry_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_infantry_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Shield Rush Tactic
good_shield_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.75
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Shield Rush Tactic
shield_rush_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Shield Rush Tactic

	days = 3
	sprite = 22
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_shield_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	pikemen_offensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25

	pikemen_defensive = -0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = -0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

good_intimidating_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 2
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25

	pikemen_defensive = 0.25

	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25

	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

		factor = 1
	}

# Intimidating Advance Tactic
intimidating_advance_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_intimidating_advance_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}

			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }

		}

		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25

# Combined Rush Tactic

	days = 3
	sprite = 12
	group = advance
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_advance_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_combined_rush_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes

	light_infantry_offensive = 0.75

	pikemen_offensive = 0.5

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0

	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = defensive
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Devastating Schiltron Tactic
good_schiltron_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 3
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	pikemen_offensive = 1.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 1.0
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Schiltron Tactic
schiltron_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Failed Schiltron Tactic
bad_schiltron_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 23
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
		emf_bad_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_bad_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_offensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = -0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	pikemen_defensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = -0.25
	knights_defensive = -0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.0
	horse_archers_defensive = -0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = -0.25

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Deceitful Schiltron Tactic
deceitful_schiltron_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			trait = trickster
			emf_schiltron_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 9
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_deceitful_tactic_custom_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	pikemen_offensive = 1.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.75
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

		emf_flexible_tactic_custom_score = yes

	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0

	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0

good_pike_assault_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 3
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { has_character_modifier = call_to_glory }
			emf_pike_assault_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 6
		emf_good_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_good_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.5
	pikemen_offensive = 1.5
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.25
	knights_offensive = 0.25
	archers_offensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.25

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
	pikemen_defensive = 0.5
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.25
	knights_defensive = 0.25
	archers_defensive = 0.5
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.25
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.25

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

# Pike Assault Tactic
pike_assault_tactic = {
	days = 3
	sprite = 13
	group = standfast
	trigger = {
		phase = melee
		emf_stand_fast_tactic_troop_requirements = yes
		flank_has_leader = yes
		leader = {
			NOT = { trait = trickster }
			emf_pike_assault_tactic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 18
		emf_ok_tactic_leader_score = yes
		emf_ok_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.25
	pikemen_offensive = 1.25
	light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
	knights_offensive = 0.0
	archers_offensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_offensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_offensive = 0.0

	light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
	heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.25
	pikemen_defensive = 0.25
	light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	camel_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
	knights_defensive = 0.0
	archers_defensive = 0.25
	horse_archers_defensive = 0.0
	war_elephants_defensive = 0.0

	enemy = {
		group = charge
		factor = 1
	}
}

		emf_cultural_tactic_tech_melee_score = yes
	}
	
	light_infantry_offensive = -0.25
	heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
	pikemen_offensive = 1.0
	light_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	camel_cavalry_offensive = -0.25
	knights_offensive = -0.25
